spec_data.Name: perl-CatalystX-SimpleLogin
spec_data.Description:
CatalystX::SimpleLogin is an application class which provides a simple login
and logout page with the addition of only one line of code and one template to
your application.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 09:32:10 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Provide a simple Login controller which can be reused
